login.recoverPasswordTxt: Enter the email associated with your account and we will send you a code to recover your password.
login.verifyYourAccountTxt: Enter the code we have sent you to:
login.resendCodeNotice: The code has been sent again, please check your email

signup.name: Name
signup.passwordGuidelines: The password must be at least 8 characters, contain at least one digit, one special character, cannot include part of the user's attributes, nor be a common or easily guessable password.
signup.verifyAccountInstruction: Enter your email account and access the link that you will find in the email we have sent you
signup.verificationEmailSendMsg: The email has been sent again, please check your email
signup.emailIsBeingVerified: Your email account is being verified
signup.emailAccountVerified: Your email account has been verified and you are logging into the app...
signup.emailAccountNotVerified: Your email account could not be verified.

main.title: Welcome to our exciting horse auction platform!
main.paragraph: Immerse yourself in the world of horse riding as you explore our selection of magnificent horses
main.paragraph2: Get ready to experience exciting auctions!

us.title: Us
us.subTitle: Attends at the auction site or remotely
us.paragraph: You will be able to watch, listen and participate by placing your bids in real time. Organise your own auction, you can register and upload the horses you want to auction, you must pay the commission for the publication of the item and specify the auction conditions.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subTitle: We are interested in hearing from you!
contact.paragraph: If you have any questions about how to participate in our auctions or want to contact us, send us a message in the following form.
contact.messageHasBeenSent: The contact message has been sent

home.exampleParagraph: This is an example paragraph for div
